table.name: attributes_view
table.viewSql: SELECT quants.name AS attribute_name, quants.unit AS attribute_unit, 'Quant'::text AS attribute_type, quants.description FROM quants UNION SELECT quals.name AS attribute_name, NULL::text AS attribute_unit, 'Qual'::text AS attribute_type, quals.description FROM quals UNION SELECT inds.name AS attribute_name, inds.scale AS attribute_unit, 'Ind'::text AS attribute_type, inds.description FROM inds;

table.name: commodities_view
table.viewSql: SELECT parent_names.name AS parent_commodity_name, commodity_names.name AS commodity_name, array_agg(commodity_code_values.value ORDER BY commodity_code_values.value) AS hs_codes FROM ((((commodities JOIN commodity_names ON ((commodity_names.com_id = commodities.id))) JOIN commodity_names parent_names ON ((parent_names.com_id = commodities.parent_id))) JOIN commodity_code_values ON ((commodity_code_values.com_id = commodities.id))) JOIN commodity_codes ON ((commodity_codes.id = commodity_code_values.com_code_id))) WHERE (commodity_names.is_default AND parent_names.is_default AND (commodity_codes.name ~~ 'HS%'::text)) GROUP BY parent_names.name, commodity_names.name, commodities.parent_id ORDER BY commodities.parent_id;

table.name: country_node_attributes_view
table.viewSql: WITH level_2_node_ids AS ( SELECT level_2.parent_id AS country_id, level_2.id AS region_id, 2 AS level FROM (nodes country JOIN nodes level_2 ON ((level_2.parent_id = country.id))) WHERE (country.id IN ( SELECT country_levels.country_id FROM country_levels)) ), level_3_node_ids AS ( SELECT level_2.country_id, level_3.id AS region_id, 3 AS level FROM (level_2_node_ids level_2 JOIN nodes level_3 ON ((level_3.parent_id = level_2.region_id))) ), level_4_node_ids AS ( SELECT level_3.country_id, level_4.id AS region_id, 4 AS level FROM (level_3_node_ids level_3 JOIN nodes level_4 ON ((level_4.parent_id = level_3.region_id))) ), level_5_node_ids AS ( SELECT level_4.country_id, level_5.id AS region_id, 5 AS level FROM (level_4_node_ids level_4 JOIN nodes level_5 ON ((level_5.parent_id = level_4.region_id))) ), level_6_node_ids AS ( SELECT level_5.country_id, level_6.id AS region_id, 6 AS level FROM (level_5_node_ids level_5 JOIN nodes level_6 ON ((level_6.parent_id = level_5.region_id))) ), all_country_level_nodes AS ( SELECT level_2_node_ids.country_id, level_2_node_ids.region_id, level_2_node_ids.level FROM level_2_node_ids UNION SELECT level_3_node_ids.country_id, level_3_node_ids.region_id, level_3_node_ids.level FROM level_3_node_ids UNION SELECT level_4_node_ids.country_id, level_4_node_ids.region_id, level_4_node_ids.level FROM level_4_node_ids UNION SELECT level_5_node_ids.country_id, level_5_node_ids.region_id, level_5_node_ids.level FROM level_5_node_ids UNION SELECT level_6_node_ids.country_id, level_6_node_ids.region_id, level_6_node_ids.level FROM level_6_node_ids ) SELECT DISTINCT node_names.name AS country_name, country_levels.name AS level_name, quants.id AS attribute_id, quants.name AS attribute_name, quants.description, (date_part('year'::text, node_quants.time_start))::integer AS year, 'Quant'::text AS attribute_type FROM ((((all_country_level_nodes JOIN country_levels ON ((all_country_level_nodes.country_id = country_levels.country_id))) JOIN node_names ON ((node_names.node_id = all_country_level_nodes.country_id))) JOIN node_quants ON ((node_quants.node_id = all_country_level_nodes.region_id))) JOIN quants ON ((quants.id = node_quants.quant_id))) WHERE (node_names.is_default AND (country_levels.level = all_country_level_nodes.level)) UNION SELECT DISTINCT node_names.name AS country_name, country_levels.name AS level_name, quals.id AS attribute_id, quals.name AS attribute_name, quals.description, (date_part('year'::text, node_quals.time_start))::integer AS year, 'Qual'::text AS attribute_type FROM ((((all_country_level_nodes JOIN country_levels ON ((all_country_level_nodes.country_id = country_levels.country_id))) JOIN node_names ON ((node_names.node_id = all_country_level_nodes.country_id))) JOIN node_quals ON ((node_quals.node_id = all_country_level_nodes.region_id))) JOIN quals ON ((quals.id = node_quals.qual_id))) WHERE (node_names.is_default AND (country_levels.level = all_country_level_nodes.level)) UNION SELECT DISTINCT node_names.name AS country_name, country_levels.name AS level_name, inds.id AS attribute_id, inds.name AS attribute_name, inds.description, (date_part('year'::text, node_inds.time_start))::integer AS year, 'Ind'::text AS attribute_type FROM ((((all_country_level_nodes JOIN country_levels ON ((all_country_level_nodes.country_id = country_levels.country_id))) JOIN node_names ON ((node_names.node_id = all_country_level_nodes.country_id))) JOIN node_inds ON ((node_inds.node_id = all_country_level_nodes.region_id))) JOIN inds ON ((inds.id = node_inds.ind_id))) WHERE (node_names.is_default AND (country_levels.level = all_country_level_nodes.level)) ORDER BY 1, 2, 4, 6;

table.name: datasets_com_eq_refs_view
table.viewSql: SELECT DISTINCT refs.id AS ref_id, refs.title AS ref_title, commodity_equivalence_group_refs.id AS com_eq_ref_id, commodity_equivalence_group_refs.title AS com_eq_ref_group_title FROM ((refs JOIN flows ON ((refs.id = flows.ref_id))) JOIN commodity_equivalence_group_refs ON ((commodity_equivalence_group_refs.id = flows.com_eq_group_ref_id)));

table.name: datasets_flow_quants_view
table.viewSql: SELECT refs.id AS ref_id, refs.title AS reference, quants.name AS quant_name, date_part('year'::text, flows.time_start) AS date_part, sum(flow_quants.value) AS quant_sum FROM (((flows JOIN flow_quants ON ((flows.id = flow_quants.flow_id))) JOIN quants ON ((flow_quants.quant_id = quants.id))) JOIN refs ON ((flows.ref_id = refs.id))) GROUP BY refs.id, refs.title, quants.name, (date_part('year'::text, flows.time_start)) ORDER BY refs.title, quants.name, (date_part('year'::text, flows.time_start));

table.name: datasets_node_roles_view
table.viewSql: SELECT reference_node_roles.ref_id, refs.title, reference_node_roles."position", reference_node_roles.node_role_id, node_roles.role FROM ((reference_node_roles JOIN node_roles ON ((reference_node_roles.node_role_id = node_roles.id))) JOIN refs ON ((refs.id = reference_node_roles.ref_id))) ORDER BY reference_node_roles.ref_id, reference_node_roles."position";

table.name: datasets_view
table.viewSql: SELECT foo.ref_id, foo.type, foo.reference, foo.description, foo.country, get_com_name(foo.parent_id) AS commodity, foo.raw_vol, foo.total_vol, foo.year FROM ( SELECT (refs.type)::text AS type, refs.id AS ref_id, refs.title AS reference, refs.description, node_names.name AS country, get_com_parent(flows.raw_id) AS parent_id, (sum(flows.raw_vol))::bigint AS raw_vol, (sum(steps.volume))::bigint AS total_vol, date_part('year'::text, flows.time_start) AS year FROM (((((refs JOIN nodes ON ((refs.country_id = nodes.id))) JOIN node_names ON ((nodes.id = node_names.node_id))) FULL JOIN flows ON ((flows.ref_id = refs.id))) JOIN steps ON ((flows.id = steps.flow_id))) JOIN commodity_names ON ((nodes.parent_id = commodity_names.com_id))) WHERE ((refs.type <> 'OTHER'::ref_type) AND node_names.is_default AND commodity_names.is_default AND (steps."position" = 0)) GROUP BY refs.id, refs.type, refs.title, refs.description, node_names.name, flows.raw_id, (date_part('year'::text, flows.time_start)) ORDER BY node_names.name, (get_com_parent(flows.raw_id)), refs.title, (date_part('year'::text, flows.time_start))) foo;

table.name: flow_paths_view
table.viewSql: SELECT DISTINCT refs.id AS ref_id, refs.title, get_reference_node_roles(refs.id) AS node_roles FROM refs WHERE (refs.id IN ( SELECT DISTINCT flows.ref_id FROM flows));

table.name: metadata_datasets_view
table.viewSql: SELECT foo.type, foo.ref_id, foo.reference, foo.description, foo.country, get_com_name(foo.parent_id) AS commodity, foo.raw_vol, foo.year, foo.quality_control_passed FROM ( SELECT (refs.type)::text AS type, refs.id AS ref_id, refs.title AS reference, refs.description, node_names.name AS country, get_com_parent(flows.raw_id) AS parent_id, (sum(flows.raw_vol))::bigint AS raw_vol, date_part('year'::text, flows.time_start) AS year, refs.quality_control_passed FROM ((((refs JOIN nodes ON ((refs.country_id = nodes.id))) JOIN node_names ON ((nodes.id = node_names.node_id))) FULL JOIN flows ON ((flows.ref_id = refs.id))) JOIN commodity_names ON ((nodes.parent_id = commodity_names.com_id))) WHERE ((refs.type <> 'OTHER'::ref_type) AND node_names.is_default AND commodity_names.is_default) GROUP BY refs.type, refs.id, refs.title, refs.description, node_names.name, flows.raw_id, (date_part('year'::text, flows.time_start))) foo;

table.name: releases_node_attributes_view
table.viewSql: SELECT foo.release_id, foo.context_id, foo.country, foo.commodity, foo.attribute_type, foo.attribute_name, foo.years FROM ( SELECT release_node_quants.release_id, release_node_quants.context_id, node_names.name AS country, commodity_names.name AS commodity, 'quant'::text AS attribute_type, quants.name AS attribute_name, quant_years.years FROM (((((release_node_quants JOIN quants ON ((release_node_quants.quant_id = quants.id))) JOIN contexts ON ((release_node_quants.context_id = contexts.id))) JOIN node_names ON ((contexts.country_id = node_names.node_id))) JOIN commodity_names ON ((commodity_names.com_id = contexts.com_id))) JOIN ( SELECT DISTINCT node_quants.quant_id AS id, array_agg(DISTINCT date_part('year'::text, node_quants.time_start)) AS years FROM node_quants GROUP BY node_quants.quant_id) quant_years ON ((quant_years.id = quants.id))) WHERE (node_names.is_default AND commodity_names.is_default) UNION SELECT release_node_quals.release_id, release_node_quals.context_id, node_names.name AS country, commodity_names.name AS commodity, 'qual'::text AS attribute_type, quals.name AS attribute_name, qual_years.years FROM (((((release_node_quals JOIN quals ON ((release_node_quals.qual_id = quals.id))) JOIN contexts ON ((release_node_quals.context_id = contexts.id))) JOIN node_names ON ((contexts.country_id = node_names.node_id))) JOIN commodity_names ON ((commodity_names.com_id = contexts.com_id))) JOIN ( SELECT DISTINCT node_quals.qual_id AS id, array_agg(DISTINCT date_part('year'::text, node_quals.time_start)) AS years FROM node_quals GROUP BY node_quals.qual_id) qual_years ON ((qual_years.id = quals.id))) WHERE (node_names.is_default AND commodity_names.is_default) UNION SELECT release_node_inds.release_id, release_node_inds.context_id, node_names.name AS country, commodity_names.name AS commodity, 'ind'::text AS attribute_type, inds.name AS attribute_name, ind_years.years FROM (((((release_node_inds JOIN inds ON ((release_node_inds.ind_id = inds.id))) JOIN contexts ON ((release_node_inds.context_id = contexts.id))) JOIN node_names ON ((contexts.country_id = node_names.node_id))) JOIN commodity_names ON ((commodity_names.com_id = contexts.com_id))) JOIN ( SELECT DISTINCT node_inds.ind_id AS id, array_agg(DISTINCT date_part('year'::text, node_inds.time_start)) AS years FROM node_inds GROUP BY node_inds.ind_id) ind_years ON ((ind_years.id = inds.id))) WHERE (node_names.is_default AND commodity_names.is_default)) foo ORDER BY foo.release_id, foo.context_id, foo.attribute_type, foo.attribute_name;

table.name: releases_view
table.viewSql: WITH ref_years AS ( SELECT DISTINCT flows.ref_id, date_part('year'::text, flows.time_start) AS year FROM flows ), ref_node_roles AS ( SELECT refs_1.id AS ref_id, get_reference_node_roles(refs_1.id) AS columns FROM refs refs_1 ), ref_flow_quants AS ( SELECT refs_1.id AS ref_id, get_reference_flow_quants(refs_1.id) AS flow_quants FROM refs refs_1 ), ref_flow_quals AS ( SELECT refs_1.id AS ref_id, get_reference_flow_quals(refs_1.id) AS flow_quals FROM refs refs_1 ), ref_flow_inds AS ( SELECT refs_1.id AS ref_id, get_reference_flow_inds(refs_1.id) AS flow_inds FROM refs refs_1 ) SELECT DISTINCT releases.id AS release_id, versions.id AS version_id, versions.symbol AS version, contexts.id AS context_id, refs.country_id, node_names.name AS country, refs.com_id, commodity_names.name AS commodity, refs.id AS ref_id, refs.title, refs.quality_control_passed, array_agg(DISTINCT ref_years.year ORDER BY ref_years.year) AS years, ref_node_roles.columns, ref_flow_quants.flow_quants, ref_flow_quals.flow_quals, ref_flow_inds.flow_inds, array_agg(DISTINCT quants.name ORDER BY quants.name) AS node_quants, array_agg(DISTINCT quals.name ORDER BY quals.name) AS node_quals, array_agg(DISTINCT inds.name ORDER BY inds.name) AS node_inds FROM (((((((((((((((((releases FULL JOIN release_versions ON ((releases.id = release_versions.release_id))) FULL JOIN versions ON ((release_versions.version_id = versions.id))) FULL JOIN contexts ON ((versions.context_id = contexts.id))) FULL JOIN refs ON ((versions.ref_id = refs.id))) FULL JOIN commodity_names ON ((refs.com_id = commodity_names.com_id))) FULL JOIN node_names ON ((refs.country_id = node_names.node_id))) FULL JOIN ref_years ON ((refs.id = ref_years.ref_id))) FULL JOIN ref_node_roles ON ((refs.id = ref_node_roles.ref_id))) FULL JOIN ref_flow_quants ON ((refs.id = ref_flow_quants.ref_id))) FULL JOIN ref_flow_quals ON ((refs.id = ref_flow_quals.ref_id))) FULL JOIN ref_flow_inds ON ((refs.id = ref_flow_inds.ref_id))) FULL JOIN release_node_quants ON (((releases.id = release_node_quants.release_id) AND (contexts.id = release_node_quants.context_id)))) FULL JOIN quants ON ((quants.id = release_node_quants.quant_id))) FULL JOIN release_node_quals ON (((releases.id = release_node_quals.release_id) AND (contexts.id = release_node_quals.context_id)))) FULL JOIN quals ON ((quals.id = release_node_quals.qual_id))) FULL JOIN release_node_inds ON (((releases.id = release_node_inds.release_id) AND (contexts.id = release_node_inds.context_id)))) FULL JOIN inds ON ((inds.id = release_node_inds.ind_id))) WHERE ((refs.id IN ( SELECT DISTINCT flows.ref_id FROM flows)) AND (commodity_names.is_default OR (commodity_names.is_default IS NULL)) AND (node_names.is_default OR (node_names.is_default IS NULL))) GROUP BY releases.id, versions.id, versions.symbol, contexts.id, refs.country_id, node_names.name, refs.com_id, commodity_names.name, refs.id, refs.title, refs.quality_control_passed, ref_node_roles.columns, ref_flow_quants.flow_quants, ref_flow_quals.flow_quals, ref_flow_inds.flow_inds ORDER BY releases.id, node_names.name, commodity_names.name, refs.title;
